titleStmt.title: A letter from Mr. Humphry Hody to a friend concerning a collection of ca[n]ons said to be deceitfully omitted in his edition of the Oxford treatise against schism : in which is likewise contained offer of certain propositions to be prov'd by the advocates for the new separation ...
titleStmt.author: Hody, Humphrey, 1659-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield, for Ant. Pisly ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. stained and torn with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
